Summary: fast blinking colored lights, lights were green, red, white, blue, object changed shaped fron elongated to half circle.
divs: sighting detailsi had taken my mom home in my car. as my mom was getting out of my car (she had been ill and i didn't want her to be in the cold night air too long) she looked at the night sky to the south-east and exclaimed "now i know that isn't a star. look lia at the lights blinking so fast. i then told her yes yes get in the house before you catch a cold of death. my mom lives approx. 200 yrds west of my home. i then drove back home to park the car and looked to the south-east toward gail oxford's home. there above and south of her home was the blinking colored lights. after watching the object for a few minutes we decided to call chuck reever. the object appeared to be approx 1 mile to 1.5 miles above the land. with the naked eye i could see that it was blinking rapidly different colors, white blue green and red. the object appeared to be the size of my small finger nail, approx. 1 mm in circumference. i took the binoculars out to watch this object and to get a closer view. the binoculars are 7x10 power. even though i still could not see any clear difined shape, i could see that it was changing shape because of the way the lights would change their position. the object changed from a veritcal line of lights to a half-circle, then went back to the vertical line. i could not clearly see any shape of the object. i had to go into the house to get a paper and pen to write down the email address of ruben-state director of calif, mom came in and said excitedly that the object had sent out "flares". she said it looked like it had spit out flares. i then returned to the outside and watched it begin changing shape again with the lights. it has now began to pulsate. i ran into my home to get my husband's new digital-camera with a tlephoto 3x lens, and began to try to take photos of the object. the object doesn't appear in any of the photos. after returning to my house and watching it from my kitchen window. it has now moved to a postion of between gail's home and a tall tree norht of her home. it now is approx 1\2 to 3\4 of a mile from land. i left the window after watching the object for approx 10 minutes and returned to watch it again but the object was not in the sky where i had last seen it. i went outside to search the sky and did not find it again.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Lockeford
There were no other sightings in Lockeford on or around December 29th 2006
